message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn to be fair, Alice. This is a one-time offer.
I'll meet you halfway, but I still think I deserve a bit more
This is a reasonable offer considering the inflation. Don't let this opportunity slip away, Alice.
Inflation is hurting me more, I need a bit more to make up for it
Alice, let's be practical.  Inflation is eating our gains. A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest way to end this.
